name: Pinoy CuiSim
description:
"PINOY CUISIM: A FILIPINO CUISINE RECIPE APPLICATION WITH COOKING SIMULATION GAME"

      was developed to provide an intuitive learning approach for users on Filipino cuisines, information of each dish and simulation for featured dishes.  

    We are 4th year Bachelor of Science of Information Technology student from Cavite State University-Imus Campus. Asking for your participation in our Capstone, one of the requirements of our course.

Download the Application by clicking the APK file below
